channel.title: Model header

item.title: Model header
item.dc:creator: @scar3d scar3d
item.description:
@scar3d wrote:

how do i add a 634 model header? ive been searching and found nothing but this :palm:

final int v(int i) {
currentOffset += 3;
return (0xff & buffer[currentOffset - 3] << 16) + (0xff & buffer[currentOffset - 2] << 8) + (0xff & buffer[currentOffset - 1]);
}

Read full topic
